## Source: ossf-package-analysis (45b2887264187731f630158d22e25fb3df12cfaa04e66bdac6fd72a617b64213)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'eslint-plugin-panel-ops' @ 55.3.56 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
